text: Ecyrus penicillatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Henry Walter Bates in 1880. It is known from Guatemala, Honduras, the United States and Mexico.BioLib.cz - Ecyrus penicillatus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1880
title: Ecyrus penicillatus
